text:
[Verse]
Neon signs are shining bright
City streets become alive
Lost in moments
Urban night
Chasing dreams under the sky

[Verse 2]
Footsteps echo on the road
Rhythms pulse
We find our way
Life in motion
Never slow
In the night we dance and sway

[Chorus]
City lights
They guide our dreams
In the night we're feeling free
Through the darkness
We are seen
Lighting up our destiny

[Verse 3]
Every corner
Story told
Hidden paths
We'll soon find out
In the hustle
Hearts are bold
Whispers loud
There's no doubt

[Bridge]
Midnight magic
Starlit glow
In the city
Moments grow
On these streets
We will bestow
Memories that overflow

[Chorus]
City lights
They guide our dreams
In the night we're feeling free
Through the darkness
We are seen
Lighting up our destiny
title: City Lights Dreaming
